items.title: Nano Banana 2: Combining Pro capabilities with lightning-fast speed

items.title: A new way to express yourself: Gemini can now create music
items.description: The Gemini app now features our most advanced music generation model Lyria 3, empowering anyone to make 30-second tracks using text or images.

items.title: Accelerating discovery in India through AI-powered science and education

items.title: Gemini 3 Deep Think: Advancing science, research and engineering

items.title: Project Genie: Experimenting with infinite, interactive worlds
items.description: Google AI Ultra subscribers in the U.S. can try out Project Genie, an experimental research prototype that lets you create and explore worlds.
